You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X X X X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X ▢ X ▢ X
X X X X X

DESCRIPTION: My grid is a 5x5 square. The border of the grid is filled with X's. Inside the border, there is an alternating pattern of blank spaces (▢) and X's, starting with a blank space in each corner of the inner 3x3 square. The pattern goes like this: blank, X, blank, X, blank in the first inner row, then X, blank, X, blank, X in the second inner row, and repeats the pattern of the first inner row in the third inner row.
continue
